definition: an irregular fold in an otherwise even surface (as in cloth), to gather something into small wrinkles or folds
details:
noun
- an irregular fold in an otherwise even surface (as in cloth)
= synonyms: ruck
verb
- to gather something into small wrinkles or folds
= example: to gather something into small wrinkles or folds
= synonyms: cockle
- become wrinkled or drawn together
= example: become wrinkled or drawn together
= synonyms: ruck
- draw together into folds or puckers
= synonyms: gather
